instruction: You are given a sentence in English language and we ask you to translate those to the Gujarati language. Consider following guidelines while doing the translation: 1) Note the input can be lowercase or uppercase. Please do the same in your translations. 2) Keep the short forms like '%s', 'CMD' intact as the literal meaning does not make sense.
input: WAV+PCM is a lossless format that holds uncompressed, raw pulse-code modulated (PCM) audio.
output: WAV+PCM એ નષ્ટવીહિન બંધારણ છે કે જે વિસંકોચન, કાચો pulse-code modulated (PCM) ઓડિયો સાચવે છે.
